title: The Man Who Flew into His Picture
medium: Room installation of painted dry wall, composition board, and painted homasote, containing enamel paint on composition board, ink and colored graphite on paper, photographs, watercolor on paper, painted wood doors, wood chair, painted wood shelf, and painted electric lightbulb
credits: Gift of Marcia Riklis, Jerry I. Speyer Fund, and Michael and Judy Ovitz Fund
